```{r caption-stuff, echo=FALSE}
# everything here is just to reset captions by section

# define custom knitr class(?) to remove fig #s
knitr::knit_hooks$set(caption = function(before, options, envir) {
  if(!before) {
    paste('<p class="caption"><center>',options$caption,'</center></p>',sep='')
    }
    })

# define functions for manual fig #s
  # determine output format
outputFormat <- knitr::opts_knit$get('rmarkdown.pandoc.to')

  # set caption numbers
capTabNo = 1; capFigNo = 1;

  # add table number
capTab = function(str){
  if(outputFormat == 'html'){
    str = paste0('Table ',capTabNo,': ',str)
    capTabNo <<- capTabNo + 1
  }
  
  return(str)
}

  # add figure number
capFig = function(str){
  if(outputFormat == 'html'){
    str = paste0('Figure ',capFigNo,': ',str)
    capFigNo <<- capFigNo + 1
  }
  
  return(str)
}
```
